Posts.Content: I chose PRMA for my Prophylactic bilateral mastectomy.  I did the one step with alloderm with Dr. Chrysopoulo.  I traveled from Oklahoma City and I am very happy.  I love his staff and him!  The experience was top notch from the beginning and he did an amazing job and I have referred 2 people that are already scheduled with him for the same.  My sister and a friend of mine.
Posts.Title: Has anyone used PRMA Plastic Surgery in TX?
